headline: Contract Specialist at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)

positions.description: I just started at this temporary position (3/7/16).  I applied for an was awarded a fellowship by my law school which allowed for a non-profit-hosted position. Currently, my position mostly entails donor research. Currently I work directly under William Hild, The Director of External Affairs, Culture and Freedom Initiative. This fellowship is meant to serve as an temporary transition position which allows a recent graduate to work while continuing to search for other employment.  I will update this description as I become more familiar with my daily tasks.
positions.title: Fellow / Intern

positions.description: My duties include; appearing at mediations and depositions, drafting legal memorandum, drafting and reviewing motions, and reviewing demand letters. I am also responsible for attending hearings and performing legal research on a variety of client requested matters. Additionally, I am responsible for negotiating settlements with clients and opposing attorneys. This position is where I have obtained the vast majority of my experience in the legal field so far.
positions.title: Associate

positions.description:
Negotiation and Mediation
Legal Research
Document Drafting
Client Interviewing
positions.title: Volunteer
